character.name: Gus
character.visual_prompt: Cute cartoon salamander like the reference image: big round head, huge round eyes with white highlights, tiny smile, smooth rounded body (NO spikes ever), curly spiral tail, exactly 4 short stubby limbs. Orange body, yellow belly. Bold black outlines, flat colors.

pages.image_prompt: Full page illustration, no text boxes. Cute orange salamander (Gus) standing at the base of a tall gray-brown mountain. Small white smoke puffs at distant peak. Gus has: big round head, huge eyes with white highlights, tiny happy smile, smooth round body NO SPIKES, curly spiral tail, 4 stubby limbs only. Blue sky, green grass. Simple flat Riso style - orange, yellow, black, green only.
